quotes.quote: Your silence will not protect you.
quotes.source: The Transformation of Silence into Language and Action

quotes.quote: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
If I didn't define myself for myself, I would be crunched into other people's fantasies for me and eaten alive.
Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.
Revolution is not a one-time event.
It is not our differences that divide us. It is our inability to recognize, accept, and celebrate those differences.
The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house.
I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
quotes.source: New York Head Shop and Museum

quotes.quote: Poetry is not a luxury. It is a vital necessity of our existence.
There is no thing as a single-issue struggle because we do not live single-issue lives.
